text: is a 1991 Japanese film directed by Tomio Kuriyama. It was released on 23 December 1991. It is the fourth film in the Tsuribaka Nisshi series. ==Awards== 15th Japan Academy Prize *Won: Best Actor - Rentarō Mikuni *Nominated: Best Music - Masaru Sato ==References== Category:1991 films Category:Films directed by Tomio Kuriyama Category:Japanese films Category:Japanese-language films 4 Category:Shochiku films Category:Films scored by Masaru Sato
title: Tsuribaka Nisshi 4
